alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 7:47PM MST until July 16 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 747 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Surprise, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Surprise, El Mirage, Youngtown, Wittmann, Sun City West, Sun City, Waddell, Surprise Stadium, White Tank Mountain Park, Beardsley and Vistancia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 125 and 148. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 4 and 12. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 112 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
